header.title: Find the perfect<wbr></wbr> unit for you
header.subtitle: At Rentak, we redefine the rental experience, making it hassle-free and secure for both homeowners and tenants.

footer.description: At Rentak, we redefine the rental experience, making it hassle-free and secure for both homeowners and tenants. Discover the ease of worry-free property management and transparent rental transactions.

our-services.title: Our services
our-services.subtitle: A great platform to buy, sell and rent your properties without any agent or commissions.

rent-management.title: Rent management
rent-management.description: Guaranteed rent collection, Bill payment, Unit conditions and more.

rent-collection.title: Rent collection
rent-collection.description: For homeowners, remind your tenants paying rent on time, with multiple payment options.

rent-payment.title: Rent payment
rent-payment.description: For tenants, multiple payment and financing options to any rent all-over Egypt.

why-us.title: Why Choose Us
why-us.subtitle: We offer the following the owner and the tenant.

monthly-reminder.title: Monthly rent reminder
monthly-reminder.traditional: Monthly rent reminders can be inconvenient.
monthly-reminder.rentak: Hassle-free, automated rent collection without the need for reminders.

unit-condition.title: Unit conditions
unit-condition.traditional: Renters risk property damages, leading to potential disputes.
unit-condition.rentak: We ensure the property's condition at the end of the lease, minimizing risks for landlords.

unpaid-bills.title: Unpaid bills
unpaid-bills.traditional: Unpaid utility bills can cause financial stress and disputes.
unpaid-bills.rentak: We handle all bills promptly, eliminating the risk of unpaid utility bills.

legal-support.title: Legal support
legal-support.traditional: Limited legal support and protection for landlords and tenants.
legal-support.rentak: Legal protection and expert support provided throughout the tenancy period.

submit.title: Submit your property
submit.description: Homeowners submit their property details to Rentak for comprehensive management.

manage.title: Effortless management
manage.description: Rentak handles legalities, rent collection, property maintenance, and ensures a smooth tenant experience.

secure.title: Secure transactions
secure.description: Homeowners receive on-time payments, and tenants enjoy transparent transactions and hassle-free living.

end.title: End of rent
end.description: Rentak guarantees the unit's condition, settles bills, and manages the transition for both parties.
